doctors.name: Dr. Matija Gikić
doctors.title: Dr. Gikić is an expert in complex jaw therapies:
doctors.biography:
Dr. Gikić is an expert in complex jaw therapies:

All on 4 concept and zygomatic implants – complete oral rehabilitation
prosthetic rehabilitation with Digital Smile Design – dental crowns, bridges, veneers
It uses implants adapted to the patient's anatomy and bone quality. He plans each operation in the software, carefully analyzing each step of the therapy.

DSD is his passion because he uses this tool to change the quality of his patients' lives for the better. He is enthusiastic about his work. He is equally dedicated to each patient. However, he believes he has one flaw – he tends towards perfectionism. Every detail is important to him so that the new smile shines in its full glory.

He is constantly searching for better options and solutions available today and to provide the best possible therapy to his patients.

"Each patient is unique and requires an individualized treatment plan because it all depends on their overall health, age, and bone quality. There are many treatment options available today, but it is crucial to understand your patient and weigh the pros and cons of each treatment to determine the best treatment plan ," concludes Dr. Matija.
